Sylv drycha (Age of Sigmar) [1,495pts]

  • **Narrative and Open Play** (Order - Sylvaneth) [1,495pts]

    • Core Battalion

      • Core Battalion: Battle Regiment

        Categories: Core Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Unified, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Battle Regiment


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details
        Unified One-drop Deployment (see 26.2.1).
        Battalion Organisation Required
        Core Battalion: Battle Regiment 1 Commander
        0-2 Sub-commanders
        2-5 Troops
        0-1 Monster or Artillery

      • Core Battalion: Warlord

        Selections: Extra Enhancement: Artefacts of Power

        Categories: Core Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Magnificent, Strategist, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Warlord


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details
        Magnificent When you pick enhancements for your army (see 27.3), you can pick 1 extra enhancement.
        Strategist Once per battle, when you receive command points at the start of your hero phase, you can receive 1 extra command point.
        Battalion Organisation Required
        Core Battalion: Warlord 1-2 Commanders
        2-4 Sub-commanders
        1-2 Troops

    • Leader [1,040pts]

      • Branchwraith [95pts]

        Selections: 5. Verdurous Harmony, Piercing Talons, Warlord - 2-4 Sub-Commanders

        Categories: BRANCHWRAITH, HERO, WIZARD, ORDER, SYLVANETH, FOREST FOLK, Leader, 9 or less wounds Leader

        Magic: Branchwraith, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Roused to Wrath, Verdant Blessing, Verdurous Harmony, Unit: Branchwraith, Unit Abilities: Blessings of the Forest, Weapon: Piercing Talons


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known
        Branchwraith 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Roused to Wrath
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Roused to Wrath 7-If successfully cast, you can summon 1 unit of 10 DRYADS and add it to your army. The summoned unit must be set up more than 9" from any enemy units, and wholly within 1" of an AWAKENED WYLDWOOD that is within 12" of the caster. The summoned unit cannot move in the following movement phase.
        Verdant Blessing 624"If successfully cast, set up 1 AWAKENED WYLDWOOD wholly within 24" of the caster and more than 1" from any other model, terrain feature or objective.
        Verdurous Harmony 718"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly SYLVANETH unit wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. You can return 1 slain model to that unit. If you picked a unit of DRYADS, TREE-REVENANTS or SPITE-REVENANTS you can return up to D3 slain models to that unit instead of 1.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Branchwraith 7"585+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Blessings of the Forest Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this model while it is wholly within 6" of any friendly AWAKENED WYLDWOODS.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Piercing Talons Melee2"34+4+-11

      • Drycha Hamadreth [330pts]

        Selections: 2. Regrowth, Battle Regiment - 1 Commander, Colony of Flitterfuries, Slashing Talons, Swarm of Squirmlings

        Categories: DRYCHA HAMADRETH, HERO, MONSTER, WIZARD, ORDER, SYLVANETH, OUTCASTS, Leader, Behemoth, Unique

        Damage Table: Wounds0, Wounds1, Wounds2, Wounds3, Wounds4, Wounds5, Magic: Drycha Hamadreth, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Primal Terror, Regrowth, Verdant Blessing, Unit: Drycha Hamadreth, Unit Abilities: Deadly Infestation, Mercurial Aspect, Song of Spite, Weapon: Colony of Flitterfuries, Slashing Talons, Swarm of Squirmlings

        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Primal Terror 610"If successfully cast, roll 2D6. Each enemy unit within 10" of the caster with a Bravery characteristic lower than this roll suffers D3 mortal wounds (roll separately for each unit).
        Regrowth 518"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly SYLVANETH unit wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. You can heal up to D6 wounds allocated to that unit.

        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Drycha Hamadreth 9"1083+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Deadly Infestation If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Colony of Flitterfurries or Swarm of Squirmlings is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Mercurial Aspect At the start of the battle round, declare whether this model is Enraged or Embittered. The relevant ability lasts until the end of that battle round. Enraged: While this model is Enraged, its Colony of Flitterfuries has an Attacks characteristic of 20 instead of 10. Embittered: While this model is embittered, its Swarm of Squirmlings has an Attacks characteristic of 20 instead of 10.
        Song of Spite You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly SPITE-REVENANTS units while they are wholly within 16" of this model.

        Colony of Flitterfuries Missile*104+3+-11

      • Spirit of Durthu [340pts]

        Selections: Amulet of Destiny, Guardian Sword, Massive Impaling Talons, Verdant Blast, Warlord - 1-2 Commanders

        Categories: HERO, MONSTER, SPIRIT OF DURTHU, ORDER, SYLVANETH, Leader, FREE SPIRITS, Behemoth, Artefact

        Artefact: Amulet of Destiny, Damage Table: Wounds0, Wounds1, Wounds2, Wounds3, Wounds4, Wounds5, Unit: Spirit of Durthu, Unit Abilities: Champions of the Everqueen's Will, Groundshaking Stomp, Impale, Spirit Paths, Wrathful Guardian, Weapon: Guardian Sword, Massive Impaling Talons, Verdant Blast


        Artefact Artefact Details
        Amulet of Destiny The bearer has a ward of 5+.
        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4
        Wounds0 Wounds SufferedMassive Impaling TalonsGuardian SwordVerdant Blast
        Wounds1 0-22+66
        Wounds2 3-42+D65
        Wounds3 5-73+D64
        Wounds4 8-93+D63
        Wounds5 10+4+D32
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Spirit of Durthu 5"1293+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Champions of the Everqueen's Will Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly SYLVANETH units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly models with this ability.
        Groundshaking Stomp At the start of the combat phase, pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of this model and roll a dice. On a 4+ that unit fights at the end of that combat phase, after the players have picked any other units to fight.
        Impale If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with Massive Impaling Talons is 6, that attack inflicts D6 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Spirit Paths In your movement phase, if this unit is within 6" of an Awakened Wyldwood in your army, it can walk the spirit paths instead of making a normal move or retreating. If it does so, remove this model from the battlefield and set it up wholly within 6" of a different friendly AWAKENED WYLDWOOD and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Wrathful Guardian Add 2 to the Attack characteristic of this model's Guardian Sword while this model is wholly within 8" of any friendly AWAKENED WYLDWOODS.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Guardian Sword Melee3"33+3+-2*
        Massive Impaling Talons Melee1"13+*-21
        Verdant Blast Missile15"*4+3+-1D3

      • Warsong Revenant [275pts]

        Selections: Chalice of Nectar, General, Levitate, Nurtured by Magic, Spearing Vines, Warlord - 2-4 Sub-Commanders

        Categories: Leader, ORDER, SYLVANETH, HERO, WIZARD, WARSONG REVENANT, 9 or less wounds Leader, General, Artefact

        Artefact: Chalice of Nectar, Command Trait: Nurtured by Magic, Magic: Magic, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Deadly Harvest, Levitate, Mystic Shield, Regrowth, The Dwellers Below, Throne of Vines, Treesong, Unleash Swarm of Spites, Verdant Blessing, Verdurous Harmony, Unit: Warsong Revenant, Unit Abilities: Alarielle's Song, Arboreal Cloak, Fly, Wyldwood Revenants, Weapon: Spearing Vines


        Artefact Artefact Details
        Chalice of Nectar When making a casting or unbinding roll for the bearer, roll 3D6, remove 1 dice of your choice, and then use the remaining 2D6 to determine that casting or unbinding roll.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details
        Nurtured by Magic Once in each of your hero phases, it this general successfully casts a spell that is not unbound, pick 1 friendly GNARLROOT unit wholly within 18" of this general. You can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to that unit.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known
        Magic 2/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Unleash Swarm of Spites, Throne of Vines, Regrowth, The Dwellers Below, Deadly Harvest, Verdurous Harmony, Treesong
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Deadly Harvest 63"If successfully cast, each enemy unit within 3" of the caster suffers D3 mortal wounds (roll separately for each unit).
        Levitate 818"Pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. That unit can fly until your next hero phase.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Regrowth 518"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly SYLVANETH unit wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. You can heal up to D6 wounds allocated to that unit.
        The Dwellers Below 710"If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 10" of the caster and visible to them and roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in that unit. For each 6+ that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Throne of Vines 5-If successfully cast, add 2 to casting rolls for the caster until the caster makes a move or is set up in a different location.
        Treesong 716"If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 16" of the caster and within 6" of an AWAKENED WYLDWOOD. Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll hit and wound rolls of 1 for attacks made with melee weapons that target that unit.
        Unleash Swarm of Spites 79"If successfully cast, roll a number of dice equal to the casting roll for each enemy unit within 9" of the caster. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Verdant Blessing 624"If successfully cast, set up 1 AWAKENED WYLDWOOD wholly within 24" of the caster and more than 1" from any other model, terrain feature or objective.
        Verdurous Harmony 718"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly SYLVANETH unit wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. You can return 1 slain model to that unit. If you picked a unit of DRYADS, TREE-REVENANTS or SPITE-REVENANTS you can return up to D3 slain models to that unit instead of 1.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Warsong Revenant 8"785+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Alarielle's Song Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly SYLVANETH units while they are wholly within 12" of any models with this ability, and subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 12" of any models with this ability.
        Arboreal Cloak Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this model. On a 4+, that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Wyldwood Revenants Add 1 to casting, dispelling and unbinding rolls for this model while it is within 9" of any AWAKENED WYLDWOODS.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Spearing Vines Melee3"53+3+-12

    • Battleline [230pts]

      • Spite-Revenants [70pts]

        Selections: 5 Spite-Revenants [70pts], Cruel Talons and Fangs, Warlord - 1-2 Troops

        Categories: SPITE-REVENANTS, ORDER, SYLVANETH, OUTCASTS, Battleline

        Unit: Spite-Revenants, Unit Abilities: Shadestalker, Unbridled Malice, Weapon: Cruel Talons and Fangs, Cruel Talons and Fangs (Shadestalker)


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Spite-Revenants 5"165+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Shadestalker The leader of this unit is a Shadestalker. A Shadestalker makes 4 attacks rather than 3 with her Cruel Talons and Fangs.
        Unbridled Malice Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 3" of any friendly units with this ability. In addition, re-roll successful battleshock tests for enemy units while they are within 3" of any friendly units with this ability.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Cruel Talons and Fangs Melee1"33+3+-1
        Cruel Talons and Fangs (Shadestalker) Melee1"43+3+-1

      • Tree-Revenants [80pts]

        Selections: 5 Tree-Revenants [80pts], Battle Regiment - 2-5 Troops, Enchanted Blade, Glade Banner, Protector Glaive, Waypipes

        Categories: TREE-REVENANTS, ORDER, SYLVANETH, NOBLE SPIRITS, Battleline

        Unit: Tree-Revenants, Unit Abilities: Glade Banner, Martial Memories, Scion, Waypipes, Weapon: Enchanted Blade, Protector Glaive


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Tree-Revenants 5"165+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Glade Banner 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Glade Banner Bearer. Whenever a unit that includes any Glade Banner Bearers makes a pile-in move, you can move it up to 6" instead of up to 3".
        Martial Memories Once per phase, you can re-roll 1 failed hit roll or 1 failed wound roll for an attack made by this unit, or 1 failed save roll for an attack that targets this unit, or 1 charge or run roll for this unit, or 1 battleshock test for this unit. You cannot use this ability to re-roll more than once dice for this unit in the same phase.
        Scion 1 model in this unit can be a Scion. Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Enchanted Blade. A Scion can be armed with a Protector Glaive instead of an Enchanted Blade.
        Waypipes 1 in every 5 models in this unit can carry Waypipes. In your movement phase, a unit that includes any Waypipes can walk the spirit paths instead of making a normal move or retreating. If it does so, remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Enchanted Blade Melee1"24+3+-11
        Protector Glaive Melee1"24+3+-12

        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Tree-Revenants 5"165+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Glade Banner 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Glade Banner Bearer. Whenever a unit that includes any Glade Banner Bearers makes a pile-in move, you can move it up to 6" instead of up to 3".
        Martial Memories Once per phase, you can re-roll 1 failed hit roll or 1 failed wound roll for an attack made by this unit, or 1 failed save roll for an attack that targets this unit, or 1 charge or run roll for this unit, or 1 battleshock test for this unit. You cannot use this ability to re-roll more than once dice for this unit in the same phase.
        Scion 1 model in this unit can be a Scion. Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Enchanted Blade. A Scion can be armed with a Protector Glaive instead of an Enchanted Blade.

In your movement phase, a unit that includes any Waypipes can walk the spirit paths instead of making a normal move or retreating. If it does so, remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from any enemy units.

    • Other [225pts]

      • Kurnoth Hunters with Greatswords [225pts]

        Selections: 3 Kurnoth Hunters with Greatswords [225pts], Battle Regiment - 2-5 Troops, Kurnoth Greatsword

        Categories: KURNOTH HUNTERS, ORDER, SYLVANETH, FREE SPIRITS, Other

        Unit: Hunters with Greatswords, Unit Abilities: Envoys of the Everqueen, Huntmaster, Sundering Strikes, Tanglethorn Thicket, Trample Underfoot, Weapon: Kurnoth Greatsword


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Hunters with Greatswords 5"574+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Envoys of the Everqueen If a friendly SYLVANETH HERO uses a command ability, you can measure the range of that command ability from a friendly KURNOTH HUNTERS unit instead of the HERO.
        Huntmaster The leader of this unit is a Huntmaster. Add 1 to the result of any hit rolls for a Huntmaster’s attacks.
        Sundering Strikes If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a Kurnoth Greatsword is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage.
        Tanglethorn Thicket At the start of the charge phase, you can say that this unit will sprout thorned branches. If you do so, until the end of the turn, this unit cannot move except to pile in up to 1", but you can add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target this unit.
        Trample Underfoot At the end of the combat phase, pick an enemy unit and roll a dice for each Kurnoth Hunter from this unit that is within 1" of it. For each result of 4 or more, the enemy unit suffers a mortal wound.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Kurnoth Greatsword Melee1"43+3+-12

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Sylvaneth

          Selections: Awakened Wyldwood, Gnarlroot

          Categories: SCENERY

          Battle Trait: Forest Spirits, Navigate Realmroots, Places of Power, Shield the Arcane, Command Abilities: The Earth Defends, Unit Abilities: Overgrown Wilderness, Roused by Magic, Wyldwood


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details
        Forest Spirits Instead of setting up a SYLVANETH unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say it is set up in the hidden enclaves as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in the hidden enclaves for each unit you set up on the battlefield. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up one or more of the reserve units that are in the hidden enclaves on the battlefield wholly within 6" of an AWAKENED WYLDWOOD and more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units that are not set up on the battlefield before the start of the fourth battle round are slain.
        Navigate Realmroots Instead of making a normal move in your movement phase, 1 friendly SYLVANETH unit wholly within 6" of an AWAKENED WYLDWOOD can navigate the realmroots. If it does so, remove that unit from the battlefield and then set it up again wholly within 6" of another AWAKENED WYLDWOOD and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Places of Power After territories have been chosen but before armies are set up, you can pick 1 terrain feature on the battlefield that was not set up by your opponent as part of their army. Do not take battleshock tests for friendly SYLVANETH units while they are wholly within 6" of that terrain feature.
        Shield the Arcane Re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly GNARLROOT units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly GNARLROOT WIZARDS.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details
        The Earth Defends You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly GNARLROOT unit wholly within 12" of a friendly GNARLROOT HERO. Until the end of that phase, roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to that unit. On a 6+ that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Overgrown Wilderness Models are not visible to each other in an imaginary straight line 1mm wide is drawn between the closest points on the two models crosses over more than 1" of an AWAKENED WYLDWOOD. This scenery rule does not apply if either model can fly.
        Roused by Magic In the hero phase, if a spell is successfully cast by a WIZARD wholly within 6" of an AWAKENED WYLDWOOD and not unbound, roll a dice for each unit within 1" of that AWAKENED WYLDWOOD which does not have the SYLVANETH keyword. On a 5+ that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds after that spells's effects have been resolved.
        Wyldwood At the end of the charge phase, roll a dice for each unit within 1" of an AWAKENED WYLDWOOD which does not have the SYLVANETH keyword. On a 6, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 1500 Points

        Categories: Game Options, Vanguard

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Prized Sorcery

        Categories: Game Options, Grand Strategy

        Grand Strategy: Prized Sorcery


        Grand Strategy Description
        Prized Sorcery When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if there are any WIZARDS from your starting army on the battlefield.
